cac:PostalAddress.cbc:Department: JRC.S.1 - EU Policy Lab: Foresight, Design & Behavioural Insights

cac:PartyName.cbc:Name: General Court of the European Union

cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Name: Framework Contract for EU policy lab
cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Description: Service related to the enhancement of the role of the EU Policy Lab, including foresight, design for policy, behavioural insights and related translation services.

cac:RealizedLocation.cbc:Description: In case of unavailability or disruptions in the functioning of the electronic means of communication provided in Section 5.1.11 in the last 5 calendar days before the time limit for receipt indicated in Section 5.1.12, the main buyer reserves the right to extend this time limit and publish the extension at the Internet address provided in Section 5.1.11, without a preceding publication of a change notice to this notice. Economic operators interested in this procurement are invited to subscribe to the call for tenders at the address in Section 5.1.11 in order to get notified when new information or documents are published.

cac:OpenTenderEvent.cbc:Description: Tenders will be opened electronically on the date and time indicated in the contract notice. It is possible to attend the opening by videoconference. Please consult the procurement documents.

cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Name: Framework Contract Foresight Centre
cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Description: Framework contract for Foresight for Policy (to provide support to the Competence Centre on Foresight in developing content, applying foresight tools, methods and approaches to co-develop effective anticipatory approaches to support EU policy development)

cac:ContractExtension.cbc:OptionsDescription: The Main Buyer reserves the right to purchase from the contractors up to 50 % of the maximum framework contract amount through negotiated procedure without prior publication of a contract notice.

cac:OpenTenderEvent.cbc:Description: Tenders will be opened electronically on the date and time indicated in the contract notice. It is possible to attend the opening by videoconference. Please consult the procurement documents

cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Name: Behavioural insight – online experiments
cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Description: Framework contract for Behavioural insight – recruitment of participants for online experiments (to provide access to relevant pools of potential participants (‘online panels’) to take part in online experiments)

cac:ContractExtension.cbc:OptionsDescription: The Main Buyer reserves the right to purchase from the contractors up to 50 % of the maximum framework contract amount through negotiated procedure without prior publication of a contract notice.

cac:OpenTenderEvent.cbc:Description: Tenders will be opened electronically on the date and time indicated in the contract notice. It is possible to attend the opening by videoconference. Please consult the procurement documents

cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Name: Design support to EU policy lab
cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Description: Framework contract - Design services for the EU Policy Lab (to provide service design and strategic design, product and graphic design, and design research)

cac:ContractExtension.cbc:OptionsDescription: The Main Buyer reserves the right to purchase from the contractors up to 50 % of the maximum framework contract amount through negotiated procedure without prior publication of a contract notice.

cac:OpenTenderEvent.cbc:Description: Tenders will be opened electronically on the date and time indicated in the contract notice. It is possible to attend the opening by videoconference. Please consult the procurement documents.

cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Name: Translation EU policy lab
cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Description: Framework contract for Translation services for the EU policy lab (to provide translation of material needed for online experiments and other activities of the EU policy lab)

cac:ContractExtension.cbc:OptionsDescription: The Main Buyer reserves the right to purchase from the contractors up to 50 % of the maximum framework contract amount through negotiated procedure without prior publication of a contract notice, if the increased ceiling does not exceed 138 999 Euro.
